part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strips of wood were lovingly layered with vinesap to create this mask, which shows acceptance into the Napthaali tribe. Over the years worn by it's previous owner, some of their latent psychic prescience has inpregnated the wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Engraved with the tales of legendary warriors of Oudin, these handcannon are the chosen weapon of the Templar Witch Hunters, warriors who are made to become that which they hate, to better combat them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A red hot, razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from point to welded shaft of steel. The Witch Hunters of Oudin eschew the shields of their kin, trusting to all out offence to slay their quarry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A red hot, razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from shimmering point to welded shaft of steel.In the black depths of the Oudin Witchforge, enslaved Espers labour to create these weapons that will then be turned upon their kin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A twisted mask of hatred stares out from beaneath a wide brim.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds Your mental armour is increased by 6. Your Ego is reduced by 6.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds You gain a mental shield. You are unaffected by psychic attacks

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A red hot, razored edge of emerald lengthens from point to finely engraved ivory handle. The Witch Hunters of Oudin eschew the shields of their kin, trusting to all out offence to slay their quarry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A red hot, razored edge of emerald lengthens from shimmering point to finely engraved ivory handle. In the black depths of the Oudin Witchforge, enslaved Espers labour to create these weapons that will be turned upon their kin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Engraved with the tales of legendary warriors of Oudin, a barrel of cold steel coats each shot in a volatile compound. Used only by the most ruthless hunters, who enjoy wounding their prey, only to extinguish their flicker of hope moments later with a devastating internal blast.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This weapon is a hand cannon, a pistol that requires two hands to wield. On successful penetration, bullets fired from this weapon lodge in their targets, which explode upon reload.
